projects.title: QR Code Component
projects.description: A QR code component that use smooth transitions with elegant blur to showcase the latest uptakes of the user social networks.

projects.title: Blog Card
projects.description: A card that shows the latest blog posts of the user, with a smooth transition between each post.

projects.title: Social Links Card
projects.description: A card that shows the latest social links of the user, with a smooth transition between each link.
